question: Vaginal Itching Before Menstruation?
question_content: Does anyone else get vaginal itching approx. 8-10 days before your period?  I have absolutely no discharge with this.  It's not a yeast infection.  Just deep inside (gross) vaginal itching.  Is this something to be concerned about?  Just been to the gyno & he said I didn't have any infection of the vagina/vulva.  Thanks

answers.answer_content: make sure you aren't using any scented products there.  Are you using any performe scented toilet paper, or anything that has a scent?  You could be having an allergic reaction then.  Other then that, I would say that it is the high hormone levels going on before your period, and it could be what is causing the itching.
Don't be ashamed. I think that is normal. You are not the only one that happens to.
it's normal. I get it all the time.
